project.name: Avocado Store
project.description: Avocado Store is a growing marketplace for sustainable and organic products. The Hamburg-based team drives the company with authenticity and passion and has already won several awards, such as Start-Up of the Year 2010. Railslove took over the active development and maintenance of Avocado Store in May 2011.
project.what_we_did: Railslove took over the development and maintenance of Avocado Store in May 2011
